entry.title: Turmoil and Protests Shake Latin America
entry.content: Riots in Brazil and Peru are the latest in a groundswell of discontent that political analysts and citizens say is driven by corruption, inequality and lack of state services.

entry.title: Globalization Isn't Dead. But a Shake-Up Is Building.
entry.content: Multinational companies still want cheap and efficient markets, but they also want safety. That’s why they’re rerouting the pathways of global trade and finance.

entry.title: Dozens of Russian Draftees Died in a Ukrainian Strike. Putin's War Machine Rolled On.
entry.content: A New Year’s Day attack on an army barracks has rattled soldiers and families but not dented Russia’s reluctant resolve.
